basic.description:
Study of the remains from the Bronze Age to the end of the Archaic period. Emphasis on the revival of architecture, painting and sculpture.
LEARNING HOURS    126 (36L;90P)
basic.subject: CLST
basic.title: Archaeology of Early Greece

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    (CLST102 and CLST103) or CLST129 or CLST200 or CLST207 or CLST101, or permission of the Department.
